sqlMap.select: select ID, STORE_ID, REMITTER_ID, REMITTER_NAME, REMITTER_BANK_CODE, REMITTER_BANKCARD_NO, INSIDE_ACCOUNT_NO, APPLY_TIME, AMOUNT_ARRIVE_TIME, TRADE_AMOUNT, TRADE_TYPE, FUNDS_CONFIRM_ID, FUNDS_CONFIRM_TIME, APPLY_STATUS, STEP_NO, APPROVAL_PERSON_ID, APPROVAL_PERSON_NAME, TRADE_EXTERNAL_NO, ORDER_ID, PAY_TYPE, TRADE_AMOUNT_UPPER, DESCRIPTION, PAYEE_NAME, PAYEE_NO, PAY_CHECK, APPLY_NAME, APPLY_NO, APPLY_PERSON_POST, OWNER_USER_NO, CUSTOMER_NAME from TB_UPP_OFFLINE_TRADE_APPLY where ID = #id:VARCHAR#

select ID, STORE_ID, REMITTER_ID, REMITTER_NAME, REMITTER_BANK_CODE, REMITTER_BANKCARD_NO, INSIDE_ACCOUNT_NO, APPLY_TIME, AMOUNT_ARRIVE_TIME, TRADE_AMOUNT, TRADE_TYPE, FUNDS_CONFIRM_ID, FUNDS_CONFIRM_TIME, APPLY_STATUS, STEP_NO, APPROVAL_PERSON_ID, APPROVAL_PERSON_NAME, TRADE_EXTERNAL_NO, ORDER_ID, PAY_TYPE, TRADE_AMOUNT_UPPER, DESCRIPTION, PAYEE_NAME, PAYEE_NO, PAY_CHECK, APPLY_NAME, APPLY_NO, APPLY_PERSON_POST, OWNER_USER_NO, CUSTOMER_NAME from TB_UPP_OFFLINE_TRADE_APPLY
order by $orderByClause$
sqlMap.insert: insert into TB_UPP_OFFLINE_TRADE_APPLY (ID, STORE_ID, REMITTER_ID, REMITTER_NAME, REMITTER_BANK_CODE, REMITTER_BANKCARD_NO, INSIDE_ACCOUNT_NO, APPLY_TIME, AMOUNT_ARRIVE_TIME, TRADE_AMOUNT, TRADE_TYPE, FUNDS_CONFIRM_ID, FUNDS_CONFIRM_TIME, APPLY_STATUS, STEP_NO, APPROVAL_PERSON_ID, APPROVAL_PERSON_NAME, TRADE_EXTERNAL_NO, ORDER_ID, PAY_TYPE, TRADE_AMOUNT_UPPER, DESCRIPTION, PAYEE_NAME, PAYEE_NO, PAY_CHECK, APPLY_NAME, APPLY_NO, APPLY_PERSON_POST, OWNER_USER_NO, CUSTOMER_NAME) values (#id:VARCHAR#, #storeId:VARCHAR#, #remitterId:VARCHAR#, #remitterName:VARCHAR#, #remitterBankCode:VARCHAR#, #remitterBankcardNo:VARCHAR#, #insideAccountNo:VARCHAR#, #applyTime:NUMBER#, #amountArriveTime:NUMBER#, #tradeAmount:NUMBER#, #tradeType:VARCHAR#, #fundsConfirmId:VARCHAR#, #fundsConfirmTime:DECIMAL#, #applyStatus:VARCHAR#, #stepNo:VARCHAR#, #approvalPersonId:VARCHAR#, #approvalPersonName:VARCHAR#, #tradeExternalNo:VARCHAR#, #orderId:VARCHAR#, #payType:VARCHAR#, #tradeAmountUpper:VARCHAR#, #description:VARCHAR#, #payeeName:VARCHAR#, #payeeNo:VARCHAR#, #payCheck:VARCHAR#, #applyName:VARCHAR#, #applyNo:VARCHAR#, #applyPersonPost:VARCHAR#, #ownerUserNo:VARCHAR#, #customerName:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update: update TB_UPP_OFFLINE_TRADE_APPLY set ID = #id:VARCHAR#, STORE_ID = #storeId:VARCHAR#, REMITTER_ID = #remitterId:VARCHAR#, REMITTER_NAME = #remitterName:VARCHAR#, REMITTER_BANK_CODE = #remitterBankCode:VARCHAR#, REMITTER_BANKCARD_NO = #remitterBankcardNo:VARCHAR#, INSIDE_ACCOUNT_NO = #insideAccountNo:VARCHAR#, APPLY_TIME = #applyTime:NUMBER#, AMOUNT_ARRIVE_TIME = #amountArriveTime:NUMBER#, TRADE_AMOUNT = #tradeAmount:NUMBER#, TRADE_TYPE = #tradeType:VARCHAR#, FUNDS_CONFIRM_ID = #fundsConfirmId:VARCHAR#, FUNDS_CONFIRM_TIME = #fundsConfirmTime:DECIMAL#, APPLY_STATUS = #applyStatus:VARCHAR#, STEP_NO = #stepNo:VARCHAR#, APPROVAL_PERSON_ID = #approvalPersonId:VARCHAR#, APPROVAL_PERSON_NAME = #approvalPersonName:VARCHAR#, TRADE_EXTERNAL_NO = #tradeExternalNo:VARCHAR#, ORDER_ID = #orderId:VARCHAR#, PAY_TYPE = #payType:VARCHAR#, TRADE_AMOUNT_UPPER = #tradeAmountUpper:VARCHAR#, DESCRIPTION = #description:VARCHAR#, PAYEE_NAME = #payeeName:VARCHAR#, PAYEE_NO = #payeeNo:VARCHAR#, PAY_CHECK = #payCheck:VARCHAR#, APPLY_NAME = #applyName:VARCHAR#, APPLY_NO = #applyNo:VARCHAR#, APPLY_PERSON_POST = #applyPersonPost:VARCHAR#, OWNER_USER_NO = #ownerUserNo:VARCHAR#, CUSTOMER_NAME = #customerName:VARCHAR# where ID = #id:VARCHAR#

update TB_UPP_OFFLINE_TRADE_APPLY
ID = #id:VARCHAR#
STORE_ID = #storeId:VARCHAR#
REMITTER_ID = #remitterId:VARCHAR#
REMITTER_NAME = #remitterName:VARCHAR#
REMITTER_BANK_CODE = #remitterBankCode:VARCHAR#
REMITTER_BANKCARD_NO = #remitterBankcardNo:VARCHAR#
INSIDE_ACCOUNT_NO = #insideAccountNo:VARCHAR#
APPLY_TIME = #applyTime:NUMBER#
AMOUNT_ARRIVE_TIME = #amountArriveTime:NUMBER#
TRADE_AMOUNT = #tradeAmount:NUMBER#
TRADE_TYPE = #tradeType:VARCHAR#
FUNDS_CONFIRM_ID = #fundsConfirmId:VARCHAR#
FUNDS_CONFIRM_TIME = #fundsConfirmTime:DECIMAL#
APPLY_STATUS = #applyStatus:VARCHAR#
STEP_NO = #stepNo:VARCHAR#
APPROVAL_PERSON_ID = #approvalPersonId:VARCHAR#
APPROVAL_PERSON_NAME = #approvalPersonName:VARCHAR#
TRADE_EXTERNAL_NO = #tradeExternalNo:VARCHAR#
ORDER_ID = #orderId:VARCHAR#
PAY_TYPE = #payType:VARCHAR#
TRADE_AMOUNT_UPPER = #tradeAmountUpper:VARCHAR#
DESCRIPTION = #description:VARCHAR#
PAYEE_NAME = #payeeName:VARCHAR#
PAYEE_NO = #payeeNo:VARCHAR#
PAY_CHECK = #payCheck:VARCHAR#
APPLY_NAME = #applyName:VARCHAR#
APPLY_NO = #applyNo:VARCHAR#
APPLY_PERSON_POST = #applyPersonPost:VARCHAR#
OWNER_USER_NO = #ownerUserNo:VARCHAR#
CUSTOMER_NAME = #customerName:VARCHAR#
where ID = #id:VARCHAR#

update TB_UPP_OFFLINE_TRADE_APPLY
ID = #record.id:VARCHAR#
STORE_ID = #record.storeId:VARCHAR#
REMITTER_ID = #record.remitterId:VARCHAR#
REMITTER_NAME = #record.remitterName:VARCHAR#
REMITTER_BANK_CODE = #record.remitterBankCode:VARCHAR#
REMITTER_BANKCARD_NO = #record.remitterBankcardNo:VARCHAR#
INSIDE_ACCOUNT_NO = #record.insideAccountNo:VARCHAR#
APPLY_TIME = #record.applyTime:NUMBER#
AMOUNT_ARRIVE_TIME = #record.amountArriveTime:NUMBER#
TRADE_AMOUNT = #record.tradeAmount:NUMBER#
TRADE_TYPE = #record.tradeType:VARCHAR#
FUNDS_CONFIRM_ID = #record.fundsConfirmId:VARCHAR#
FUNDS_CONFIRM_TIME = #record.fundsConfirmTime:DECIMAL#

STEP_NO = #record.stepNo:VARCHAR#
APPROVAL_PERSON_ID = #record.approvalPersonId:VARCHAR#
APPROVAL_PERSON_NAME = #record.approvalPersonName:VARCHAR#
TRADE_EXTERNAL_NO = #record.tradeExternalNo:VARCHAR#
ORDER_ID = #record.orderId:VARCHAR#
PAY_TYPE = #record.payType:VARCHAR#
TRADE_AMOUNT_UPPER = #record.tradeAmountUpper:VARCHAR#
DESCRIPTION = #record.description:VARCHAR#
PAYEE_NAME = #record.payeeName:VARCHAR#
PAYEE_NO = #record.payeeNo:VARCHAR#
PAY_CHECK = #record.payCheck:VARCHAR#
APPLY_NAME = #record.applyName:VARCHAR#
APPLY_NO = #record.applyNo:VARCHAR#
APPLY_PERSON_POST = #record.applyPersonPost:VARCHAR#

update TB_UPP_OFFLINE_TRADE_APPLY set ID = #record.id:VARCHAR#, STORE_ID = #record.storeId:VARCHAR#, REMITTER_ID = #record.remitterId:VARCHAR#, REMITTER_NAME = #record.remitterName:VARCHAR#, REMITTER_BANK_CODE = #record.remitterBankCode:VARCHAR#, REMITTER_BANKCARD_NO = #record.remitterBankcardNo:VARCHAR#, INSIDE_ACCOUNT_NO = #record.insideAccountNo:VARCHAR#, APPLY_TIME = #record.applyTime:NUMBER#, AMOUNT_ARRIVE_TIME = #record.amountArriveTime:NUMBER#, TRADE_AMOUNT = #record.tradeAmount:NUMBER#, TRADE_TYPE = #record.tradeType:VARCHAR#, FUNDS_CONFIRM_ID = #record.fundsConfirmId:VARCHAR#, FUNDS_CONFIRM_TIME = #record.fundsConfirmTime:DECIMAL#, APPLY_STATUS = #record.applyStatus:VARCHAR#, STEP_NO = #record.stepNo:VARCHAR#, APPROVAL_PERSON_ID = #record.approvalPersonId:VARCHAR#, APPROVAL_PERSON_NAME = #record.approvalPersonName:VARCHAR#, TRADE_EXTERNAL_NO = #record.tradeExternalNo:VARCHAR#, ORDER_ID = #record.orderId:VARCHAR#, PAY_TYPE = #record.payType:VARCHAR#, TRADE_AMOUNT_UPPER = #record.tradeAmountUpper:VARCHAR#, DESCRIPTION = #record.description:VARCHAR#, PAYEE_NAME = #record.payeeName:VARCHAR#, PAYEE_NO = #record.payeeNo:VARCHAR#, PAY_CHECK = #record.payCheck:VARCHAR#, APPLY_NAME = #record.applyName:VARCHAR#, APPLY_NO = #record.applyNo:VARCHAR#, APPLY_PERSON_POST = #record.applyPersonPost:VARCHAR#, OWNER_USER_NO = #record.ownerUserNo:VARCHAR#, CUSTOMER_NAME = #record.customerName:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select:
select ID, STORE_ID, REMITTER_ID, REMITTER_NAME, REMITTER_BANK_CODE, REMITTER_BANKCARD_NO, INSIDE_ACCOUNT_NO, APPLY_TIME, AMOUNT_ARRIVE_TIME, TRADE_AMOUNT, TRADE_TYPE, FUNDS_CONFIRM_ID, FUNDS_CONFIRM_TIME, APPLY_STATUS, STEP_NO, APPROVAL_PERSON_ID, APPROVAL_PERSON_NAME, TRADE_EXTERNAL_NO, ORDER_ID, PAY_TYPE, TRADE_AMOUNT_UPPER, DESCRIPTION, PAYEE_NAME, PAYEE_NO, PAY_CHECK, APPLY_NAME, APPLY_NO, APPLY_PERSON_POST, OWNER_USER_NO, CUSTOMER_NAME from ( select ID, STORE_ID, REMITTER_ID, REMITTER_NAME, REMITTER_BANK_CODE, REMITTER_BANKCARD_NO, INSIDE_ACCOUNT_NO, APPLY_TIME, AMOUNT_ARRIVE_TIME, TRADE_AMOUNT, TRADE_TYPE, FUNDS_CONFIRM_ID, FUNDS_CONFIRM_TIME, APPLY_STATUS, STEP_NO, APPROVAL_PERSON_ID, APPROVAL_PERSON_NAME, TRADE_EXTERNAL_NO, ORDER_ID, PAY_TYPE, TRADE_AMOUNT_UPPER, DESCRIPTION, PAYEE_NAME, PAYEE_NO, PAY_CHECK, APPLY_NAME, APPLY_NO, APPLY_PERSON_POST, OWNER_USER_NO, CUSTOMER_NAME, ROWNUM as oracle_rn from TB_UPP_OFFLINE_TRADE_APPLY
order by $orderByClause$
)
where oracle_rn < $endNum$
and oracle_rn > $skipNum$

select ID, STORE_ID, REMITTER_ID, REMITTER_NAME, REMITTER_BANK_CODE, REMITTER_BANKCARD_NO, INSIDE_ACCOUNT_NO, APPLY_TIME, AMOUNT_ARRIVE_TIME, TRADE_AMOUNT, TRADE_TYPE, FUNDS_CONFIRM_ID, FUNDS_CONFIRM_TIME, APPLY_STATUS, STEP_NO, APPROVAL_PERSON_ID, APPROVAL_PERSON_NAME, TRADE_EXTERNAL_NO, ORDER_ID, PAY_TYPE, TRADE_AMOUNT_UPPER, DESCRIPTION, PAYEE_NAME, PAYEE_NO, PAY_CHECK, APPLY_NAME, APPLY_NO, APPLY_PERSON_POST, OWNER_USER_NO, CUSTOMER_NAME from ( select OUT.* , ROWNUM as oracle_rn2 from ( select ID, STORE_ID, REMITTER_ID, REMITTER_NAME, REMITTER_BANK_CODE, REMITTER_BANKCARD_NO, INSIDE_ACCOUNT_NO, APPLY_TIME, AMOUNT_ARRIVE_TIME, TRADE_AMOUNT, TRADE_TYPE, FUNDS_CONFIRM_ID, FUNDS_CONFIRM_TIME, APPLY_STATUS, STEP_NO, APPROVAL_PERSON_ID, APPROVAL_PERSON_NAME, TRADE_EXTERNAL_NO, ORDER_ID, PAY_TYPE, TRADE_AMOUNT_UPPER, DESCRIPTION, PAYEE_NAME, PAYEE_NO, PAY_CHECK, APPLY_NAME, APPLY_NO, APPLY_PERSON_POST, OWNER_USER_NO, CUSTOMER_NAME from TB_UPP_OFFLINE_TRADE_APPLY
order by $orderByClause$
) OUT )
where oracle_rn2 < $endNum$
and oracle_rn2 > $skipNum$

select ID from ( select ID, ROWNUM as oracle_rn from TB_UPP_OFFLINE_TRADE_APPLY
order by $orderByClause$
)
where oracle_rn < $endNum$
and oracle_rn > $skipNum$

select ID from ( select ID as ID , ROWNUM as oracle_rn2 from ( select
$selectedField$ as ID
TB_UPP_OFFLINE_TRADE_APPLY.ID as ID
, ROWNUM as oracle_rn from TB_UPP_OFFLINE_TRADE_APPLY
order by $orderByClause$
) )
where oracle_rn2 < $endNum$
and oracle_rn2 > $skipNum$
